Name: Ian Cameron
Details:
Born 2514, died 2602.

Became Director-General of the Terran Hegemony in 2549 after his older brother was killed by a conspiracy of military officers dissatisfied with the Hegemony's policy of aggressive peacekeeping towards its neighbors, which Ian then suppressed after they also attempted a coup against his rule.

A skillful diplomat, Ian Cameron came up with the idea of a Star League to unify all of humanity under his leadership and eventually persuaded the other five Great Houses to sign the Star League Accords in 2571, with himself as First Lord and his wife as the first Commander-in-Chief of the new Star League Defense Force.

Later, Ian Cameron also forcefully annexed the four Independent States of the Periphery realms into the Star League during the Reunification War which started in 2572 and ended in 2796 after the final surrender of the Taurian Concordat.
